name: Area-41
description:
This game is a prototype made in a few weeks for Yaz Jam 2022 (YAZJam³ - The Choice ... - itch.io)

Game Description:
Explore an atmospheric, endless, procedurally generated world as you use your gravity powers to explore, find treasure, and look for the gateway to Area-41

Game Controls

Mouse Only:
Hold "Left Click" & point the mouse to move
Hold "Right Click" to use your gravity power to float 
Use "Middle Mouse Button" to go through portals and gates
Place your mouse over blocks and press "Middle Mouse Button" to dig
